title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

WHO says kids shouldn't get vaccinated. Clay doesn't want his kids vaccinated because they're not in danger from covid. Buck on people still wearing masks in New York. Biden hypes new variant scare to push vaccinations. Clay's had covid, decided not to get vaccinated. Ron Johnson on Dr. Fauci. Clay's take: Covid response was our biggest failure since Vietnam. June 21, 1788 is the day the Constitution was ratified. Rush's timeless wisdom on the Constitution and American Greatness. Clay and Buck are optimistic about America's future despite all the left does to try to tear the country down. Clay and Buck close out the show by thanking Rush.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
